notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, S.C.; Data curation, O.E.A. and V.T.; Formal analysis, O.E.A.; Funding acquisition, S.C.; Investigation, O.E.A. and V.T.; Methodology, O.E.A., A.B., H.W. and S.C.; Project administration, S.C.; Resources, S.C.; Visualization, O.E.A.; Writing—original draft, Olympia E. Anastasiou; Writing—review & editing, V.T., A.B., H.W. and S.C. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
